column2: O history, either I will adorn you with freedom, or I will consider you as I have not lived you
In order to invent, study and at last come up with new and faster ways to progress with the world. Building this Library is not a bad choice
This Den is essential for Pirates to hold on to their operations and their wealth, it acts like a Headquarters except for Pirates
This structure always has been the epicenter for the goods produced in this province. It usualy is a sign of prosperity as the goods produced here are often very valuable
This Administrative Center is used to keep the Confederation in check and to have a more efficient Administration within the realms
This Local Inn is great for the civilians that live within these Castle Walls
An Open Market for the poor and the rich alike, here everyone can buy anything as long as you have the price for it
This is the heart of the Military power of the Castle. In this building, plans and strategies are being planned to make this castle ever more secure
This outpost is build far outside the castle, to patrol arround the area but to also watch for possible enemy attacks
Just like the outpost, the watchtower is built to see even further away while being within the safety of the castle
Every Castle needs maintenence, one of the overlooked needs is the hygene of the streets. That is where the Civil Service comes in, to keep everything clean and healthy

The nights can be dangerous and can be filled with criminals. That is why the Civil Guard exsists. To police arround the streets and keeping them safe while also being used as a last line of defense for the cilivians in case the enemy breaches in the castle walls
Food has been a important part of any human life, rich and poor a like. that is why a Bakery is realy usefull to feed the masses

Without Gold or Silver, no Empire or Kingdom can be run. Hence why there are the Silver Minters. These minters make sure that we have just enough Silver currency flowing in to keep up with the Economy
As a Confederation, we have to keep a good reputation. Hence why This Bureau is set up, to resolve any diplomatic issues, from within the Castle to international matters
Education is always good, it makes our citizens smarter. Therefore we have the Academy to expand and store knowledge for future generations
This bridge was made to have easier access to the realm of these lands
This marketplace was built within the walls of your realm to have more merchants buy goods from you
This tower was made to have a better lookout arround your lands to see who comes to your land
This blacksmith was made to have more commerce within your realm while also having a source to make new weaponry
These are the well known roads that all lead to the old Capital of the World, Rome. These roads are very usefull for transportation from an Caravan to a whole Army

In order to let even more goods and trade flow in, it might not be a bad idea to start setting up a Trade Hub next to the Castle. This assures that various luxurious goods and wealth will flow in. Unlike our other buildings, this will assure us alot of wealth
A Castle Headquarters is good to organize your army with great efficieny while also having the Headquarters as a rally point for your army
Having a Stone Quarry is good to have quicker and easier access to Stone which has great uses to building new buildings
A Castle Library can be very educational and only affordable for the rich nobility or for merchants and rulers alike
This Windmills is a great help for your Farms that you have already build. While this land is rich, it is wise to hence build this Windmill on your Farms
A Lumbermill is a great way to collect Wood while making more space for future projects for the County, while making a small profit in the markets

A Mountain Fort is a great way to make use of these almost unusable mountains which their only benifit is to defend our armies durring battles, it would not be a bad idea to further exploit these mountains for our army
A Livestock Farm is a great way to feed our army and make a profit out of it. While we have these plain lands, we might aswell use it the best way we can while having our Farms
A Desert Camp is another great way to get more units out of these nomadic travelers that have no purpose, perhaps we can give them a new purpose, which is to fight for us
This building serves as a place to wash yourself clean for prayer or in general and learning from the experience as in many religions this is important.
A welcoming resting camp for pilgrims, providing a place for spiritual reflection and respite on their journeys.
An armory specializing in crafting armor for the skilled inhabitants that have experience or are a natural when it comes to wielding a weapon, ensuring they are well-equipped for their sacred duties.
This serves as a training ground for when the holy place needs protection by using the inhabitants and preparing them for war.
A checkpoint at the city entrance collecting tolls, contributing to the city's revenue and upkeep.
The central headquarters for the city guard, coordinating efforts to maintain law and order throughout the urban landscape.
A bustling marketplace at the heart of the city, facilitating trade, commerce, and vibrant economic activity.
A city caravansary providing a hub for travelers, merchants, and their caravans, fostering cultural exchange and trade.
A facility dedicated to minting gold, contributing to the city's wealth and economic prosperity.
Besides having an Academy and a Library. It could also be handy to have a place for students to go where they are allowed to talk more freely, while in a Library, talking usually is not allowed

There are many patients, sometimes they perhaps have wishes that they want to see come true. Therefore there is this Wishing Well where they can wish whatever they want. Who knows, maybe it will come out one day

It can be sad and grim in a Hospital with many having major complications and are maybe even being tormented by it. In order to distract those that are doing bad mentally or physically, there is this small yet enjoyable Theatre where they can have fun with the many stories told by the performers.
This Shop has been built after a Merchant figured to set it up while having a surplus of Spices that came from Far Asia all the way to here.
In order for Merchants to have a easier time traveling, these roads are made for that purpose and to also ensure faster and safer travel
This Shop has been built by a Merchant that has all kinds of valuable Jewelry that are quite valuable and only ever affordable by the Nobility or rich Merchants that pass this Trade Route

Solders that have fought many wars and that either need a break or retired veterans that need a place to go can visit this Knight's Guild. Here these brave soldiers can rest, talk about their experience and even train. A ideal place to inspire people, let the soldiers rest for their next war or even rehire veterans that still are willing to fight.

There are also those that are seeking a more flexible way of fighting wars without being tied to a King. These kind of brave men can therefore visit the Mercenary Guild to become a Mercenary or even as small as a Personal Guard's Soldier for someone. This ensures that soldiers are on the market to be hired from for the people that has the coin, to Nobility and perhaps even Kings and Emperors.

An army cannot properly function without cavalry, and horses do not fall out of the sky. Hence the role of this Horse Breeder is to produce the finest horses that are also trained and ready for war or for fast travel

Meat is a important meal and for those that can afford it need somewhere to buy it from. That is where the Slaugherhosue comes in, it is built to provide especially the Nobility and even the Lord of these lands to provide delicious meat

It is very wise as a lord to construct your own Farm, therefore you are not relied on Merchants or goods that come from elsewhere. This is especially usefull in the state of a crisis of a besieging, where food is critical.
The peasantry obviously needs a place to live and rest, hence why these houses are put to place. So the Peasantry can afford shelter and a place to make their food and live life.
In order to make a Church realy stand out, one of the things that the Monks do is take care of Nature and this garden
Besides the usefullness to call people to prayer, it is also a great way to gather arround your soldiers that protect this church
a Church has to be prepared for anyone that means harm, from raiders to an enemy army. Therefore it is usefull to have Archers that can shoot from far away

Besides the Monastical duties, the Church has to also somehow make their income. This can be done in the market where the fruits and other food can be sold that has been harvested from the Church Market
As a Church needs to take care for those that cant take of themselfs. It is realy usefull to have this Hospital Sector, it is also handy to supress any possible diseases
It is a duty of a Church to provide housing to the poor and needy, hence why these houses are put to place. So the Peasantry can afford shelter and a place to make their food and live life.
One thing the Peasantry and even the Nobility needs is general goods. Therefore this Merchant has opened his store within this City to sell these goods to the people for a profit of course
In order to secure the Cities Security and Valuables, it needs an army. Hence why these barracks will be built to recruit an army able to take out any foe
Besides an army, it is also usefull to have soldiers that can take out enemies from far away while being with in the walls of this City

Merchants trade not only with the people but also with other Merchants within. In order to do this accordingly and safely, this Forum has been established so that Merchants can meet eachother and talk buisness

Of course there are also those Merchants that have crossed land and sea. They deserve a break which can be done within this Inn. From eating and drinking to staying for some sleep. It can be all done in this Inn

A City also needs its people and therefore needs to establish this housing district, hence why these houses are put to place. So the Peasantry can afford shelter and a place to make their food and live life.
In order for a Trade Route to flourish, it needs another market so that the crowd can be spread further away so that in the end, everyone can be welcome to this Trade Route
Since this Trade Route has quite the attraction, it needs to be able to give away food. Hence why this Farm is created to sustain the people that travels towards here
Wool is very important for goods like Clothing and many more, it is especially popular amongst the peasantry. Therefore this Merchant that specialises in wool has established his store here
With all these people and crowds, it can be hard to control. If there is Chaos, there is a need of Order. This Trade Route Guard is therefore placed to maintain order within this Trade Route

For those that are looking for expensive kind of stone. There is the Marble Merchant, which sells Marble for quite a price. Marble is a kind of stone that is used by Nobility. Marble is especially popular because of the Romans, especially when Augustus turned Rome into a city of Marble

The Abbey of Iona is one of the oldest Christian religious centres in Western Europe. The abbey was a focal point for the spread of Christianity throughout Scotland and marks the foundation of a monastic community by St. Columba.
This Gold Mine has been used often by many Empires and Kingdoms, Perhaps this is a sign of prosperity for the area
This hut belongs to a Spanjard that actually is a Berber African that likes to claim that he is Spannish. This hut is purely made out of wood and has skulls arround the hut
This hut belongs to a Spanjard that actually is a Berber African that likes to claim that he is Spannish. This hut is purely made out of wood and has skulls arround the fort
The Palace of the Grand Master of the Knights of Rhodes, also known as the Kastello, is a medieval castle in the city of Rhodes, on the island of Rhodes in Greece.
Fort Saint Elmo is a Crusader stronghold in Malta that is used by the Knights Hospitaller, a Catholic Holy Order that was founded in Jerusalem and resides in this stronghold in Malta
Kolossi Castle is another Crusader stronghold in Cyprus that also is used by the Knights Hospitaller, a Catholic Holy Order that was founded in Jerusalem and resides in this stronghold in Cyprus
Navigating Mountains can prove to be challenging, and this province is no exception.

The purpose of this unique building is to manage the province with more efficieny so that the province can stay prosperous and rich. This Administrative Building was hence used by many Kingdoms, Empires and other realms alike.

This unique fortress is build by the people and the Count of this island. It is build in such way in which it is made harder to invade and take over the island while also having trade still flow in to keep the economy running.
Hadrian's Wall is a former defensive fortification of the Roman province of Britannia, begun in AD 122 in the reign of the Emperor Hadrian.

Perhaps the best known of the palace chapels is the Sistine Chapel named in honor of Sixtus IV (Francesco della Rovere). It is famous for its decoration that was frescoed throughout by Renaissance artists.

This Dock has been used for many times by many, form the locals to even royalties and many armies that needed to cross to the other side of the sea. These trips would usually take a long time to prepare but also to cancel in case the trip would be canceled
